articles.author: Matt Roush
articles.title: Ken Burns’ ‘American Revolution,’ ‘Landman’ Returns, Stream ‘Charlie Brown’ for Free, Glen Powell on ‘SNL’ - TV Insider
articles.description: A curated critical checklist of notable weekend TV.
articles.content: In advance of the nation’s 250th birthday next year, TV historian Ken Burns gives the epic treatment to The American Revolution. Billy Bob Thornton returns in Taylor Sheridan‘s Texas oil drama Landma… [+6680 chars]
